casebody.data:
Jonathan WILNER, et al., and all others similarly situated
v.
The CEDARS OF CHAPEL HILL, LLC, et al. No. 234P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 24, 2015. James T. Williams, Jr., Greensboro, for The Cedars of Chapel Hill, LLC, et al. Jennifer K. Van Zant, Greensboro, for The Cedars of Chapel Hill, LLC, et al. D.J. O'Brien, III, Greensboro, for The Cedars of Chapel Hill, LLC, et al. Benjamin R. Kuhn, Raleigh, for Wilner, Jonathan, et al. Amie C. Sivon, Raleigh, for Wilner, Diane, et al. R. Michael Pipkin, Chapel Hill, for Wilner, Diane, et al. Paul Stam, Apex, for N.C. Association of Realtors.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 7th of July 2015 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of September 2015."
